gulp:
{

	"projectURL": "<projecturl>", 
	"productURL": "./", 
	"browserAutoOpen": false,
	"injectChanges": true,

	"styleSRC": "./src/sass/style.scss", 
	"styleDestination": "./assets/css", 
	"outputStyle": "compact", 
	"errLogToConsole": true,
	"precision": 10,
	"jsVendorSRC": "./src/js/vendor/*.js", 
	"jsVendorDestination": "./src/js/", 
	"jsVendorFile": "vendor", 

	"jsCustomSRC": "./src/js/main.js", 
	"jsCustomDestination": "./assets/js/", 
	"jsCustomFile": "main", 

	"imgSRC": "./src/img/*", 
	"imgDST": "./assets/img/", 

	"watchStyles": "./src/sass/*.scss", 
	"watchJsVendor": "./src/js/vendor/*.js", 
	"watchJsCustom": "./src/js/main.js", 
	"watchPhp": "./**/*.php", 

	"textDomain": "<slug>", 
	"translationFile": "<slug>.pot", 
	"translationDestination": "./languages", 
	"packageName": "<slug>", 
	"bugReport": "https://richardmiddleton.me/", 
	"lastTranslator": "Richard Middleton <richard@richardmiddleton.me>", 
	"team": "RichardMiddleton <richard@richardmiddleton.me>", 

	"BROWSERS_LIST": [
		"last 2 version",
		"> 1%",
		"ie >= 11",
		"last 1 Android versions",
		"last 1 ChromeAndroid versions",
		"last 2 Chrome versions",
		"last 2 Firefox versions",
		"last 2 Safari versions",
		"last 2 iOS versions",
		"last 2 Edge versions",
		"last 2 Opera versions"
	]
}
style:
/******************************************************************
Theme Name: <themename>
Description: Custom theme by Richard Middleton
Author: Richard Middleton
Author URI: http://www.richardmiddleton.me
Version: 1.0

Tags: Sass
******************************************************************/
